screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .pixela file in 2DD Entertainment Pixela 1
screenshot.caption: PIXELA file open in 2DD Entertainment Pixela 1

description: The PIXELA file is the main file type associated with Pixela. To create a PIXELA file, select File → New Project , draw your image, then select File → Save Project .

Each layer in a PIXELA file is a 36x36 grid that can be filled in with different color brush strokes. You can choose to make each layer visible or transparent. To export layers as a PNG file, select File → Export Layers as Sprite sheet . To export a current layer, select File → Export Current Layer Only .
